org.apache.tomcat.util

Class DomUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tomcat.util.DomUtil
  • Deprecated. 
    Unused: Will be removed in Tomcat 8.0.x

    @Deprecated
public class DomUtil
extends Object
    Few simple utils to read DOM
    Author:
    Costin Manolache

        elemName - name of the element, or null for any
